message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $200.  It's a steal you won't find anywhere else!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the interest in selling the product, but I can only pay up to $80 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget, but $200 is really my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $140?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still looking to keep my costs down. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $100?
